oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nancy Harvey Searcy
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Embracing Citizenship
Military Service
African American women; World War, 1939-1945--Participation, African American; World War, 1939-1945--Participation, Female; United States -- Armed Forces -- Women
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Many exceptional young women signed up for military duty during World War II. In this studio portrait, Nancy Searcy wears the insignia of a Corporal.
